summary.para: The FILEPATHS_SINGNERINFO structure stores source and target path information, and also file signature information. The setup functions send FILEPATHS_SIGNERINFO as a parameter in several of the notifications sent to callback routines. For more information, see Notifications.

blockquote.para: [!NOTE] The setupapi.h header defines FILEPATHS_SIGNERINFO as an alias which automatically selects the ANSI or Unicode version of this function based on the definition of the UNICODE preprocessor constant. Mixing usage of the encoding-neutral alias with code that not encoding-neutral can lead to mismatches that result in compilation or runtime errors. For more information, see Conventions for Function Prototypes.

summary.para: Path to the source file. This member is not used when the structure is used with a file delete operation.
If an error occurs, this member is the system error code. If no error has occurred, it is NO_ERROR.
Additional information that depends on the notification sent with the FILEPATHS_SIGNERINFO structure.
For SPFILENOTIFY_COPYERROR notifications, Flags specifies dialog box behavior and can be one of the following values.

description.para: Do not offer the user the option to browse.
Do not offer the user the option to skip the file.
Inform the user that skipping the file may affect the installation.

summary.para: For SPFILENOTIFY_FILEOPDELAYED notifications, Flags specifies the type of file operation delayed and can be one of the following values.

description.para: A file copy operation was delayed.
A file delete operation was delayed.
